name: The Petite Protector
description:
The Petite Protector

Have you ever wondered what happened in your bedroom at night? What does happen to the infamous monsters that lurk underneath your bed? Well, our Petite Protector is here to save the day and make sure her child doesn't get hurt!

Made by:
Programmers:

Nick Azarafroz
Renzo Depoortere

Artists:

Christiane Schaper
Johanna Csonka
Sarah-Luna Van Steen

The Petite Protector is the result of a local 3 day game-jam hosted by DAE Howest. The goal is to kill all the enemies and safe the night. You can defend yourself by ripping off your arm!

We wish you the best of luck in your quest to keep the bedroom safe!

Controls:

Aim by right-clicking and then shoot with the left button.
Walk around with aswd.
Look around with the mouse.
